mapper.select: select a.item_nm ,a.subitem_nm ,a.ctprvn_nm ,a.signgu_nm ,a.club_nm ,b.ctprvn_cd from sportsclub a join citycode b on b.ctprvn_nm = a.ctprvn_nm order by b.ctprvn_cd , a.signgu_nm limit 15 offset (#{page} - 1) * 15
select a.item_nm, a.subitem_nm, a.ctprvn_nm, a.signgu_nm, a.club_nm, a.trobl_ty_nm, a.oper_time_cn, a.club_intrcn_cn from sportsclub a where a.club_nm = #{club_nm}

select a.item_nm ,a.subitem_nm ,a.ctprvn_nm ,a.signgu_nm ,a.club_nm ,b.ctprvn_cd from sportsclub a join citycode b on b.ctprvn_nm = a.ctprvn_nm where a.item_nm = #{keyword} or a.ctprvn_nm = #{keyword} order by b.ctprvn_cd , a.signgu_nm
